instructions: Beat the butter, sugar, 3 Tbsp of lemon juice and eggs together in a bowl.
Combine the flour, baking powder and salt in a separate bowl.
Alternate between adding milk and dry mix into the egg mixture.
Add blueberries and lemon zest.
Transfer to a greased 8x4 loaf pan and bake for 60-70 minutes at 350deg
Cool for 10 minutes and transfer cake from pan to a cooling rack
combine remainign lemon juice and sugar to create the glaze; drizzle over cake and cool completey
